description: This is an HTML source file for a web-based database viewer interface. It includes structure, styling, and client-side JavaScript for browsing databases, tables, and viewing data.
external_files: CSS styles included within the file

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches list of databases and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resets current state.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Toggles visibility of tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders data as an HTML table.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates HTML for individual table cells based on data type and size.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long or object data.
